record.jsxtip: Fires when the user selects this radio button and before the radio group value changes. Canceling this event prevents the selection.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this radio button loses focus.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this radio button gains focus.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the browser event that triggers this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires after this radio button is removed from the DOM.

record.jsxtext: the object that publishes this event.
the parent of this radio button before it is removed from the DOM.
